restaurant

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • restaurant.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class provides the listing of singleItems and Meals that one Restaurant offers. The creation of items is done in this class. Functions to edit Meals and Items are stored here.
    Author:
    maxspahn, jeremyaugot
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
